name: House of Moiré
description:
Chloe Alexandra Thompson and Matthew Edwards (aka aesthetic.stalemate) are interdisciplinary artists and collaborators. Chloe is a composer and sound designer interested in the physicality of sound and mediation of technology in installation and performance, and Matthew blends installation art, performance and virtual reality.PART OF MUTEK'S IMMERSIVE COLLECTIONAn electronic music and digital arts festival for 23 years, now navigating the artistic possibilities of VR.

MUTEK acknowledges the support of the Canada Council for the Arts.
